projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Open Data Portal
projects.bodyText:
- Built web backend using Flask to combine, organize, categorize Axon, EDC, and IQD data for an automotive company TFS
 - Built Python scripts to preprocess raw data and populate data in PostgreSQL database
 - Built CRUD operations on multiple components with PostgreSQL database
 - Integrated project with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) with GitHub on Elastic Beanstalk EC2 (Flask backend) and on Vercel (NodeJS frontend)
 - Applied Agile methodologies in project development, Jira with 2-week Sprint delivery to clients

projects.title: AI2GO
projects.bodyText:
- Published paper IPCCC 2020 – “Paradox of AlphaZero: Strategic vs. Optimal Plays” 
- Solved Go board game with a smaller board size (5x5 to 7x7) using the architecture of AlphaZero of Google’s DeepMind
- Modified open-source code to be able to train neural networks that work with smaller board sizes
- Developed Python scripting tools to analyze the output patterns to find optimal solutions on smaller Go sizes

projects.title: Raspberry-Pi Toy Car
projects.bodyText:
- Modified toy car into Raspberry-Pi remote control car through camera module and Wi-Fi network
- Developed Python script to remote control over keyboard

projects.title: Emotion Detection
projects.bodyText:
- Developed simple PyTorch trained model to detect basic facial emotions through computer’s webcam
 - Increased 20% accuracy from using customized dataset compared to the originally offered dataset
